definitions.definition: To fight for superiority; to contend; to compete eagerly so as to gain something.
definitions.example: Her suitors were all vying for her attention.

definitions.definition: To do or produce in emulation, competition, or rivalry; to put in competition; to bandy.
To stake a sum of money upon a hand of cards, as in the old game of gleek. See revie.
The act of one who vies; rivalry.
